articles.author: Pete Thamel
articles.title: Sources - Big 12, Pac-12 won't partner as talks officially end
articles.description: Officials from the Big 12 told Pac-12 officials on Monday that they're no longer interested in exploring a partnership, sources said.
articles.content:
Talks about a partnership between the Big 12 and the Pac-12, which had been discussed extensively the past two weeks, have officially ended, sources told ESPN.

articles.title: With talk of trade a hot topic, Washington Nationals star Juan Soto knows 'it's out of my hands'
articles.description: Among the most notable names on the trade market, Washington star Juan Soto, 23, spoke to reporters Monday about his fate, as he awaits word from the Nationals, saying he "feels really uncomfortable," but realizing that ultimately, "it's out of my hands."

articles.title: Report -- Golf voice David Feherty leaving NBC, expected to join LIV series
articles.description: David Feherty is leaving NBC and is expected to join the breakaway tour as an analyst for 8-to-10 tournaments annually, the New York Post reported Monday, citing sources.
articles.content:
The Saudi-funded LIV Golf series is set to another big name -- this one outside the playing ropes.

articles.content:
